content:
Marketing managers can now design referral promotions aligned with their business goals. Reusable promotion templates enable them to decide when advocates and their friends are rewarded, and customize promotion stage names.

Using the refreshed referral promotion guided flow, marketing managers select the promotion's reward and then customize the promotion email content. The promoted emails and widget are grouped by stage, and the content is dynamically updated based on the template.

The revamped promotion email templates automatically add reward details in emails corresponding to stages where advocates or their friends are rewarded.

Marketing managers no longer have to select an org-wide email address as the sender for referral promotion emails, as the sender profile of a promotion's Marketing Cloud business unit is used instead.

Accurately predict referrals by analyzing additional member features such as mailing city, state, and contact age. Track the advocate count as a promotion KPI and view the number of advocates for a promotion in the related list.

Companies can run referral promotions for their loyalty program members to generate referrals, keep them engaged, and reduce customer acquisition costs.
title: Referral Marketing Enhancements
